Source code for errordlg

import wx


[docs]def error_dlg(text):
    """Create and show message dialog with text.
    *atributes:*
        text - Error message       

    """
    dial = wx.MessageDialog(None, text, 'Error', wx.OK|wx.ICON_ERROR)
    dial.ShowModal()
